banner.title: Welcome to My Own Build Template Engine Website!
banner.subtitle: I am excited to have built this entire framework from scratch to deepen my fundamental knowledge.

project.title: About This Project
project.subtitle: A Custom Web Framework Built from Scratch
project.description: This website is powered by my own custom web framework called 'Espresso' - a lightweight, fast, and modular framework built entirely from scratch using TypeScript and Node.js. No external frameworks or libraries were used in the core implementation.
features: Template Engine with partials and helpers
Trie-based router system for efficient routing
Streaming video support with range requests
File attachment handling with download support
Custom logger similar to Morgan with colorized output
Advanced middleware pipeline with error handling

advancedFeatures.router: Trie data structure for O(k) route matching where k is the path length
advancedFeatures.streaming: Video streaming with HTTP range requests and partial content support
advancedFeatures.attachments: File download system with proper headers and streaming
advancedFeatures.logger: Custom logging system with multiple transports and formatters
advancedFeatures.cors: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing middleware with configurable options

about.heading: About Me
about.description:
Software Engineer
I am a passionate software engineer with 3 years of experience crafting scalable and performant web applications. Specializing in JavaScript, TypeScript, and PHP, I work across the stack using technologies like React, Next.js, NestJS, and Laravel to deliver clean, user-focused solutions.

With a strong foundation in microservices, I enjoy architecting systems that are modular, efficient, and easy to maintain. My development toolkit includes RabbitMQ, Redis, and PostgreSQL, and I consistently apply best practices such as SOLID principles and OOP in my code.

A continuous learner of DevOps and cloud-native development, I leverage AWS and DigitalOcean to automate deployments and optimize system performance. I've designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines using tools like GitHub Actions, Jenkins, and SonarQube to ensure rapid and reliable software delivery.

Throughout my career, I've led the development of complex platforms, including membership portals and e-commerce systems, serving thousands of users and driving measurable business outcomesâ€”such as a 90% cost reduction and 70% increase in renewals.

Let's connect to share ideas and explore how we can build secure, scalable, and user-centered software together!
